keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map gt scrollToTop
map gg scrollToBottom
map r reload
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map gc openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map gu goUp
map gr goToRoot
map gd scrollPageDown
map gu scrollPageUp
map gi focusInput
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map df LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map gf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map if LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map < goPrevious
map > goNext
map cm Marks.activateCreateMode
map gm Marks.activateGotoMode
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map B Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map ss Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map uu Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map t createTab
map p visitPreviousTab
map 1 firstTab
map 0 lastTab
map m toggleMuteTab
map x removeTab
map X restoreTab
map w moveTabToNewWindow
map zx closeTabsOnLeft
map cx closeTabsOnRight
map ax closeOtherTabs
map [ moveTabLeft
map ] moveTabRight
map ? showHelp
